blogs.name: Jason Data
blogs.shortSummary: The website failed to get the data from the server and is showing default values from a local JSON file

posts.title: What is JSON data?
posts.body: Since there is no access to the server, the website fetches a limited amount of data from a local JSON file located within the website's files, it is only there for viewing purposes to see how the website looks when there is no server access.
